apple.name: Apple
benefits: Rich in fiber for healthy digestion
Helps keep teeth clean and healthy

kidFriendly.description: Crunchy and sweet! Apples help keep your teeth strong and your tummy happy!
kidFriendly.funFact: An apple a day keeps the doctor away! üè•

benefits: High in potassium for heart health
Natural energy boost from healthy sugars

kidFriendly.description: Sweet and creamy! Bananas give you energy to play and run around!
kidFriendly.funFact: Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not! ü§Ø
